mapper.sql: ID, POINT, INCOME, TOTAL_INCOME, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, DAY_INCOME_STAT_DATE

insert into PNT_ACCOUNT
ID,
POINT,
INCOME,
TOTAL_INCOME,

DAY_INCOME_STAT_DATE,

mapper.update:
update PNT_ACCOUNT
POINT = #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCOME = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_INCOME = #{totalIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DAY_INCOME_STAT_DATE = #{dayIncomeStatDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update PNT_ACCOUNT set POINT = #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCOME = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_INCOME = #{totalIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DAY_INCOME_STAT_DATE = #{dayIncomeStatDate,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, POINT, INCOME, TOTAL_INCOME, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, DAY_INCOME_STAT_DATE from PNT_ACCOUNT
